meanings.definition: The act or process of moving forward or advancing.
meanings.sent1: Her progression in learning to read was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The progression of the sun across the sky marked the passing of time.
meanings.sent3: The progression of the snail was so slow that it seemed to be standing still.
meanings.sent4: The progression of technology has revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent5: The steady progression of the river downstream was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A sequence of numbers or events that follow a pattern or order.
meanings.sent1: The progression of odd numbers is 1, 3, 5, 7, 9.
meanings.sent2: The musical notes followed a clear progression in the song.
meanings.sent3: The progression of colors in the rainbow always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The progression of days of the week is Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday.
meanings.sent5: The progression of chapters in the book kept me engaged till the end.

meanings.definition: The development or improvement of something over time.
meanings.sent1: The progression of her painting skills was evident in each new artwork.
meanings.sent2: The progression of technology has made our lives easier.
meanings.sent3: The progression of the plant from seed to flower was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: The progression of his health after the surgery was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The progression of knowledge through education is essential for growth.
